Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntityListViewPageFetcher<V extends ViewCreationContext>  
    EntityViewElementBuilderFactory<T extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder>  
    EntityViewElementBuilderProcessor<T extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder>
    Processor interface for modifying a ViewElementBuilder that is being created for a particular EntityPropertyDescriptor.
    EntityViewElementBuilderService
    Central service interface for retrieving or creating ViewElementBuilder instances for EntityPropertyDescriptors.
    EntityViewFactory<T extends ViewCreationContext>  
    EntityViewFactoryProvider
    Provider that creates default EntityViewFactory implementations for a specific EntityConfiguration or EntityAssociation.
    EntityViewProcessor<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>  
    ViewCreationContext  
    ViewElementLookupRegistry
    Registry that maps ViewElementBuilder instances or element type names fo ViewElementMode.
    ViewElementTypeLookupStrategy
    Strategy interface that looks up the most fitting ViewElement type to create.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
    Extends the SimpleEntityViewFactorySupport with support for configuring a set of properties that should be rendered for a given entity type.
    DefaultEntityViewFactoryProvider
    Default implementation for creating view for a particular EntityConfiguration.
    EntityDeleteViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>
    Creates the delete form for an entity.
    EntityFormView  
    EntityFormViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>  
    EntityListView
    Model for a basic list view.
    EntityListViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>
    Handles a list of items (entities) with support for the properties to show, paging, sorting and configuring the sortable properties.
    EntityView
    Uses a backing ModelMap for storing and fetching the different attributes.
    EntityViewElementBuilderContext<T extends EntityView>  
    EntityViewElementBuilderFactoryHelper  
    EntityViewElementBuilderFactorySupport<T extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder>  
    EntityViewElementBuilderHelper  
    EntityViewElementBuilderServiceImpl  
    EntityViewViewFactory
    Base implementation for viewing properties of a single entity.
    RepositoryEntityListViewPageFetcher  
    SimpleEntityViewFactorySupport<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
    Base support class for EntityViewFactory implementations that supports the following features: template specification message source and message code resolving custom entity link builders custom view processors for customizing the view generation
    SingleEntityViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext,T extends EntityView>
    Simple implementation of ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport that builds the view elements in the mode specified, for the properties configured.
    ViewElementLookupRegistryImpl  
    ViewElementMode
    Represents the mode for which a ViewElementBuilder is being requested.
